objects.text:
• CHIC & ELEGANT DESIGN
• SOFT FAUX WOOL
• MEMORY FOAM COMFORT
• NON-SLIP TPR SOLE

product_details.description: CHIC & ELEGANT DESIGN: The gloss of the upper, with the bright gold brand copper buckle, makes our slippers more textured and fashionable. The micro suede shoe lift increases ease of wearing and hanging up. This fuzzy closed-back slipper is suitable for cold weather COMFORTABLE MATERIALS: Soft and smooth faux wool for the upper and lining, this house shoe keeps your feet warm and comfortable.The lining material also has the effect of absorbing moisture, which makes your feet dry HIGH-DENSITY MEMORY FOAM: With a cloud-like memory foam footbed, this slipper is tailored to your foot according to your every step for all-day comfort. Additional insole-cushion improves your walking stability and helps you to have total relaxation at home after a day's hard work NON-SLIP TPR SOLE: Featuring a textured slip-resistant sole, this ladies slipper gives you a stable and comfy footing on slippery ground. The lightweight sole makes your feet less burdened. You can wear these house shoes to lounge in your bedroom, or fetch your mails outside the house GIFTS WRAPPED IN BOXES: These delicate slippers are wrapped in boxes. Coming in various colors and sizes, they are perfect gifts for the women you love, answering the invitation of festivals and holidays, like Mother's Day, Christmas or Thanksgiving Day. Easy to maintain, hand and machine washable Fur description - Faux Fur ** Sole material - Thermoplastic Rubbers ** Outer material - Faux Wool ** Closure type - Pull-On **

banner_details:
This banner features a cozy and stylish promotional layout for fuzzy home slippers. The design is divided into four quadrants, each using a tone of purple to create visual balance—ranging from lavender and lilac to deep violet and soft mauve. The top-left contains bold white typography for titles assigned to IDs `heading_1` and `heading_2`, giving clear emphasis. A soft pastel subheading (`subheading`) sits below them with dotted embellishments. A central product image (`product_image`) is placed diagonally across the right-half, creating depth. The bottom-left includes a feature list (`description`), a bold price tag (`price`), and a clearly call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Violet (#7B4FBF)
- Lavender (#9370DB)
- Mauve (#FBCAFF)
- Soft Lilac (#8A5BD8)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Accent Purple (#6A3CB5)
product_color: The product image showcases a cozy pair of slippers in a dominant lavender purple shade that exudes warmth and comfort. The primary color is a plush soft lavender (#A78CC4), creating a luxurious and soothing visual appeal. Inside the slippers, a creamy off-white fur lining (#F2EDE2) provides a soft contrast, enhancing the product's cozy essence. The sole is a muted beige tan (#CBBBA0), grounding the design and balancing the hues. A small metallic button detail in muted gold (#B29A60) adds a sophisticated highlight. These colors blend softly yet stand out with natural contrasts, perfect for a muted pastel-themed advertisement banner.
